strIntroduction: Sit back and relax with a small group in the comfort of your mini-coach, as you travel to the amazing Blue Mountains. Your Driver Guide will provide details of the day’s itinerary while you enjoy the journey west.
strTitle: Blue Mountains Classic Full Day Tour (from Sydney)

strIntroduction: We will start off in the city of Darwin and head to the northern terrain known as Kakadu National Park. It is famous for its world heritage of ancient aboriginal wall paintings and well-known marshlands. Experience the view of nature and human culture!
strTitle: 1-Day trip to Kakadu National Park

strIntroduction: 抵達黃金海岸機場，拉著巨型行李的你，此時最需要的就是輕鬆便利的黃金海岸機場接駁巴士，幫你省去冗長尋找交通工具的時間！
strTitle: Gold Coast Airport Transfer Bus

strIntroduction: What better way to explore Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach than with your own friendly surf instructor. On this half-day small-group tour, get picked up from your hotel, take advantage of an exclusive group surfing lesson, tour a surf lifesaving club, and enjoy a beachside lunch.
strTitle: Bondi Local Tour - Half Day Tour with Transfer.

strIntroduction: Tour along Western Australia's beautiful coast from Broome to Perth! Let's unearth some of Australia's most beautiful and uncrowded places.
strTitle: Broome to Perth Overland (10 Days)

strIntroduction: Jump from up to 14,000ft over Cairns, and you can choose to soak up beautiful rainforest and valley views or amazing reef and island views.
strTitle: Cairns Tandem Skydive From Up To 14,000FT

strIntroduction: Oh My God! Don't miss the reptile Zoo in Sydney! See crocodiles, turtles and other reptiles. It's a local favorite! (Official website prices for reference: AUD$ 34 adults, AUD$18 children)
strTitle: Sydney's Reptile Park tickets

strIntroduction: 在中文司機兼導遊的帶領下，以最輕鬆的方式，四天暢玩墨爾本與周邊熱門景點，必去行程包含菲利浦島企鵝歸巢、疏芬山淘金與大洋路、十二門徒。
strTitle: 【Melbourne 4 Day Tours】Phillip Island, Sovereign Hill and Great Ocean Road

strIntroduction: 前往澳洲最知名的淘金古鎮巴拉瑞特鎮參觀，進入充滿中世紀色彩的古堡，挑戰巨龍迷宮、到訪牙仙棒棒糖商店、親眼目睹古堡競技場，享受一連串的奇幻之旅。之後參觀疏芬山金礦，體驗淘金樂趣與感受淘金年代的市鎮景觀與民生模樣。
strTitle: Ballarat Sovereign Hill and Kryal Castle Day Tour

strIntroduction: Pay a visit to the popular attraction, Mornington Peninsula. Have a breath-taking coastal view, taste wine and enjoy hot springs.
strTitle: Mornington Peninsula 1-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Independent visitors in Tasmania only need this ticket to travel easy and light around main attractions in Hobart!
strTitle: 【Back-packers' Favorite】Ticket to tour bus around Hobart, seeing major sights in Hobart in a breeze

strIntroduction: Located within the Surfers Paradise Marriott Resort & Spa, Citrique welcomes you with fresh seafood and an airy atmosphere. Their buffet restaurant has quickly become one of the Gold Coast's most talked about dining destinations, and an absolute must for visitors to the area.
strTitle: 【 Gold Coast Meal ticket 】 Surfers Paradise Marriott Resort • Seafood Buffet Meal Ticket （Dinner）

strIntroduction: Take the luxe, speedy Great Adventures out to tour around Green Island Reef and Norman Reef, giving you a glimpse into the abundant life on both reefs, and probe into the unique ecological landscape of the rain forest on Coral Island.
strTitle: Adventure to two marvelous reefs: Sight-seeing on boats in Cairns! Norman Reefs and Green Island Reefs

strIntroduction: The Swan Valley is 25 minutes drive away from Perth. From wildlife park to winery, the Swan Valley really does have something for everyone.
strTitle: Swan Valley Day Tour

strIntroduction: Prebook a convenient and comfortable transfer from Perth Airport (PER) to your Perth CBD, Fremantle or Hillarys hotel!
strTitle: Shared Arrival Transfer: Perth Airport to Hotel

strIntroduction: A must take nighttime trip in Gold Coast! Ride on off-road four wheel drive into the rain forest, explore starlight in the cave -- the Glow Worms!
strTitle: Glow Worm Caves Night Tour (from Gold Coast)

strIntroduction: Planning a trip to Australia with the entire family? Want to go to the beach to? Then you must try surfing on one of the best surfing spots on earth: Bondi Beach!
strTitle: Bondi Family Private Lesson

strIntroduction: If you’re a “savoury buff”, have a healthy appetite for great tasting food and friendly fun then this is the tour for you!
strTitle: Swan Valley Tasting Tour: Food, Wine and Beer (Afternoon)

strIntroduction: Avoid the stress of finding a taxi ,confusing public transportation and others' disturbance by prebooking a private transfer service!
strTitle: Private Perth Airport Pick up ＆ Drop off Service

strIntroduction: SEA LIFE Melbourne Aquarium contains more than 500 species of marine life. It's a marine lovers' paradise! With 13 different areas for you to explore, as well an exciting feeding show and an interactive marine life exhibit. It is absolutely worth the price of admission!
strTitle: "Australia's second-largest aquarium" SEA LIFE Melbourne Aquarium

strIntroduction: 用海陸空三種方式暢玩黃金海岸，從不同角度欣賞沿岸美景！
strTitle: Sea, land and air tour: Helicopter and speed cruising around stunning scenic spots of Gold Coast (Chinese service)

strIntroduction: 大人小孩都愛的雪梨水族館，有許多不同主題的展覽館，讓你一探澳洲各種海域的生物樣貌！
strTitle: SEA LIFE Sydney Aquarium Tickets

strIntroduction: Visit historic Spanish castle and Paronella Park, the place that inspired Japanese animation master, Hayao Miyazaki, to create Laputa: Castle in the Sky; a trip to the world famous Millaa Millaa waterfalls, basking in the greenery of forest and cooling in springs of the waterfalls, then search for rare animals and plants in the tropical rain forest, and take a boat-ride around the volcanic lake. The plentiful itinerary will color up your romantic day.
strTitle: Visit ancient castle: Paronella Park, and boat-ride on volcanic lake

strIntroduction: Join this 12-day trip that heads from the waterholes of Tunnel Creek to the beaches around Broome.
strTitle: The Great Kimberley Overland (12 Days)

strIntroduction: It’s an early start this morning heading to the amazing Nitmiluk National Park and Katherine Gorge. Your guide will keep you entertained along the way with stories about Australia’s longest highway and the history of the region.
strTitle: Katherine Gorge Cruise & Edith Falls

strIntroduction: 一流的SPA按摩、美麗放鬆的環境，徜徉在清新自然的綠蔭中，享受頂級的泰北蘭納風情SPA。
strTitle: 【Fah Lanna 頂級泰式按摩】讓旅途中的你疲勞盡消

strIntroduction: Go by steam train into the "village of rain forest", Kuranda, north of Cairns, and take a cable car above the bushes overlooking the forest, and then take a amphibian ferry to tour the rain forest, and experience local aboriginal culture and visit Australia's unique animals.
strTitle: Kuranda Rain Forest & Cable Car Ride Tour

strIntroduction: With 2-hour driving from Perth, visit the Pinnacles, Yanchep National Park and Lobster Shack. This day trip is a good choice for all the family.
strTitle: The Pinnacles, Lobster Shack and Sand Boarding Day Tour

strIntroduction: 早晨前往黃金海岸體驗獨一無二的捉蟹之旅，感受豐富的海濱生態，並享用螃蟹大餐，下午前往澳洲最大水果熱園，快來體驗這個超值有趣的一日遊行程！
strTitle: Exclusively limited: Gold Coast crab-fishing boat trip & fruit garden one day trip

strIntroduction: Koalas in the trees! Use the Official website to get 10% off! If you're going to Australia you simply must pet the cute koalas and have your picture taken with them! Go with KKday to the Sydney's Koala sanctuary! (*Official websites prices for reference: adult AUD$ 27, AUD$ 15 children.) )
strTitle: Sydney's Koala Park Sanctuary tickets

strIntroduction: 到墨爾本周遭的丹頓農森林公園搭乘蒸氣火車穿越蓊鬱的山谷，品嘗美味的英式上午茶與午餐，並在亞拉河谷參觀酒莊、品酒，享受一趟優雅放鬆的旅程
strTitle: Yarra Valley Winery & Puffing Billy Railway Tour

strIntroduction: KKday offers you the best choice to experience the Whitesundays; a helicopter fly you over the ocean to overlook numerous reputed islands and barrier reefs!
strTitle: Overlooking the heavenly island views: Islands Stopover Heli Flight(25 / 60 minutes)

strIntroduction: Shared Melbourne International Airport pick up and drop off service. Operate 7 days a week, 365 days a year from 8:30 - 18:00.
strTitle: Shared Melbourne Airport Pick up and Drop off Service

strIntroduction: Go to Western Australia's famous natural wonder -- Wave Rock, and explore aboriginal cave and rock wall paintings, enjoying the beautiful west Australia along the way!
strTitle: Wave Rock 1-Day Tour

strIntroduction: 超豐富墨爾本郊區一日遊，涵蓋雅拉(Yarra Valley)著名的酒莊、丹頓農山區百年蒸汽火車(Puffing Billy)與菲利普島看神仙企鵝歸巢
strTitle: 3-Day Tour to Yarra Valley, Puffing Billy Steam Train & Phillip Island

strIntroduction: Skypoint observation decks on 77th and 78th floors of Q1 Bldg., Gold Coast, give tourists a 360-degree panoramic view of the entire Gold Coast
strTitle: A 360-degree overlook view: Skypoint observation deck on 78th floor of Gold Coast Q1 Bldg.

strIntroduction: 在這趟荷巴特一日遊，風趣的中文導遊將帶領你漫步在港口碼頭、浸沐在海風吹拂的怡人氛圍；在莎拉曼卡廣場體驗悠閒且豐富的人文風情；走訪皇家植物園和威靈頓山，欣賞荷巴特優美的自然景色。
strTitle: 【Chinese-speaking tour guide shows you around Hobart】 Salamanca Place, Royal Botanic Garden, and Mount Wellington

strIntroduction: You’ll head out over the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge and through the leafy North Shore suburbs, heading to the beautiful Hunter Valley. Today you’re going to taste some of the finest wines this country has to offer, amid the stunning landscape of the Hunter Valley. Your Driver Guide will give you details of the day’s itinerary as you sit back and enjoy the view.
strTitle: Hunter Valley Harvest Wine Experience (3 Wine Tastings)

strIntroduction: Enjoy the most popular island in south Australia, interact with the cutest koala and many other special spices only in Australia.
strTitle: Adelaide Kangaroo Island Two Days Tour

strIntroduction: Private Melbourne Tullamarine Int. Airport pick up and drop off service. Operate 7 days a week, 365 days a year.
strTitle: Private Melbourne Airport Pick up ＆ Drop off Service

strIntroduction: KKday將帶您遊覽紐西蘭南島知名景點如蒂卡波湖、庫克山、皇后鎮、米爾福德峽灣、蒂阿腦湖等，以及體會充滿英倫風情的城市－基督城、但尼丁。
strLocation: New Zealand, Queens town, Christchurch, South Island
strTitle: 【暢遊南島各大景點】紐西蘭美食６日遊，走訪基督城、皇后鎮、庫克山國家公園

strIntroduction: 皇后鎮租車自駕遊紐西蘭南島，免費贈送GPS衛星導航與多項保險，KKday租車享半價折扣，讓你的自由行旅程輕鬆又省錢！

strIntroduction: 一張卡暢遊紐西蘭與澳洲！ 高速上網，可視訊、網路通話、看影片，流量不限制！ 最適合無時無刻需要網路的你！
strTitle: 【高速網卡吃到飽】紐澳通用！流量無限、高速視訊、跨國通話（紐西蘭出發）

strIntroduction: The tour commences by covering the central city highlights, including Cathedral, Botanical Garden and the Bridge of Rememberence .
strTitle: Half Day City Sightseeing - Discover Christchurch

strIntroduction: Take an journey to Milford Sound, the world famous fiord which rich in rainforest, glacier carved valleys and beautiful waterfalls.
strLocation: New Zealand, South Island, Queens town

strIntroduction: Private Queenstown Airport pick up and drop off service. Operate 7 days a week, 365 days a year.
strLocation: New Zealand, South Island, Queens town
strTitle: Private Queenstown Airport Pick up ＆ Drop off Service

strIntroduction: Enjoy the spectacular Southern Alps mountain range view of New Zealand, and visit famous scene of Mt Cook and Lake Tekapo.
strLocation: New Zealand, South Island, Queens town
strTitle: Full day trip to Mt Cook and Lake Tekapo (From Queenstown To Christchurch )

strIntroduction: 高品質上網 WiFi 分享器，外觀時尚，輕巧好攜帶，給你暢通無阻的上網體驗！取機還機超方便！

strIntroduction: 【專業嚴謹讓你安心駕駛 】自己開飛機的精彩體驗，別擔心沒開過，Sky Guam 由日本人經營，且有中文教練詳細引導解說。

strIntroduction: 搭著美人魚公主號帆船，探訪可愛的野生海豚，體驗珊瑚礁浮潛與海釣，探索清透海洋世界，相揪家人好友一起 GO！

Private Tour: Giza Pyramids, Sphinx, Egyptian Museum, Khan el-Khalili Bazaar
Sinbad Submarine Under The Red Sea

strIntroduction: Airport transfer operate 24 hours a day 7 days a week.
strTitle: Airport Transfer from Casablanca Airport to Hotel One Way

strIntroduction: Come on and visit Fez, the Moroccan spiritual capital, for a sense of the Morocco's religious heritage!
strTitle: Sightseeing Fez from Casablanca

strIntroduction: To better discover Marrakesh, enter an intricate maze of the narrow streets in the world of the souks!
strTitle: Marrakech - Souks and Medina

strIntroduction: Visit the medieval town of Marrakech and immerse yourself in it's thriving culture and impressive history.
strTitle: Sightseeing Marrakech from Casablanca

strIntroduction: Delve into the history and culture of Casablanca and explore the highlights of this old world city.
strTitle: Sightseeing Casablanca from Casablanca

strIntroduction: Visit the fabulous Ouzoud falls (330 feet), one of Morocco's exceptional destinations!
strTitle: Magic Ouzoud Falls

strIntroduction: Enjoy a journey from Marrakech to Ouarzazate for views of valleys and desert landscapes.
strTitle: Ouarzazate Full Day

strIntroduction: Desire to discover the beauty of desert with a gentle camel? This is a desert adventure without having to go to the Sahara!
strTitle: Camel Ride in Marrakech Palm grove

strIntroduction: Let deluxe vehicle pick you up and drop you off in luxury when you choose a private transfer.
strTitle: Private Transfer Marrakech Airport to Hotel in Marrakech

strIntroduction: Enjoy a traditional Moroccan dinner under tents, entertained by belly dancers, horsemen and more
strTitle: Fantasia 1001 Nights Dinner Show

strIntroduction: Visit the capital of the Moroccan kingdom for a glimpse at modern Morocco.
strTitle: Sightseeing Rabat from Casablanca

strIntroduction: Travel to the bohemian resort of Essaouira, formerly known as Mogador, on a full-day tour. Explore its traditional port, stroll through its Medina and enjoy the laid-back rhythm of life.
strTitle: Essaouira Full Day

strIntroduction: Join for a culinary journey through Cape Town, showcasing the best of South Africa's artisan producers: cheese makers, chocolatiers, craft beer breweries, world-renowned wines, traditional snacks and more!
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Cape Town Foodie Thursdays

strIntroduction: Explore the majesty of South Africa on this day tour through the spectacular Cape Peninsula. Enjoy the beauty of Clifton and Camps Bay, gaze at the peaks of the Twelve Apostles, visit a penguin colony, and see the famous wineries of Constantia.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Cape Peninsula Full Day Tour

strIntroduction: Discover the many attractions Cape Town has to offer on a double-decker sightseeing bus tour. Choose a 1-day or 2-day ticket, and hop on and off the bus whenever you like. Travel on the 4 tour routes, and enjoy multi-lingual audio commentary on board.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Cape Town Hop-On Hop-Off Tour: 1 or 2 Day Ticket

strIntroduction: Take a breathtaking journey through the winelands of the South African Cape. Witness the wine making process from the vineyard to the bottle and visit the historical towns of Stellenbosch, Franschoek and Paarl.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Full-Day Wine Route Tour: South African Cape

strIntroduction: Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of Cape Town from the top of Table Mountain on a 4-hour sightseeing tour. Explore the city center on a drive around the Malay Quarter, Company Gardens, Castle of Good Hope, Diamond Works, Milnerton and more.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Cape Town: Table Mountain and Half-Day City Tour

strIntroduction: On this tour you will visit different townships and the prison Mandela was incarcerated, giving you an overview of Mandela's struggle against Apartheid and its effects. It will also disclose how those affected continue to struggle for a better life today.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Township and Robben Island Combination Tour

strIntroduction: Get up close to wildlife in a way you never thought possible on this 3-day safari. Explore the rugged South African terrain by bike and Land Rover and see cheetah, giraffe, buffalo, and rhinoceros. Taste exquisite wine, and stay in luxury accomodation.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: 3-day Cheetah Conservation and Wild Ride from Cape Town

strIntroduction: Take the worry out of your arrival at Cape Town International Airport with a pre-booked private transfer to your Cape Town hotel. Avoid the long lines for taxis and the hassle of navigating public transport. Enjoy a private, chauffeur-driven service instead.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Private Airport Transfer to/from Cape Town

strIntroduction: Set sail across the famous Shark Alley and come face to face with one of nature's most beauitful predators -- the Greak White Shark on this amazing cage diving experience.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Dive with Great White Sharks: Full-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Go on a full-day private whale and wine tour of the Hermanus region of South Africa’s Western Cape and look out for Southern Right Whale on their annual migration. Continue with a visit to 2 wine estates to sample some of the best SA wines.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Hermanus Whale Watching & Wine Tasting Full-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Experience Africa's most noble creatures on their own land at the incredible Inverdoorn Nature Reserve. Travel 2.5 hours from Cape Town to Inverdoorn to ride in an open-air 4x4, getting up close and personal with wild animals in their natural environment.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Full-Day Inverdoorn Reserve Safari from Cape Town

strIntroduction: Explore the Pilanesburg National Park, 90 minutes from Johannesburg, staying at the private game lodge of Black Rhino. Spot elephant, rhino and lion on daily game drives in a remarkable landscape of a 1,200 million year old volcano.
strLocation: Republic of South Africa, Cape Town
strTitle: Pilanesberg 3-Day Safari at Black Rhino Lodge
